p: AcEO (0.1, 0.5 and 1 mg/ml) added to washed platelets inhibited aggregation triggered by thrombin (0.1 U/ml) and ADP (1 μM). The dose 1 mg/ml showed a maximum inhibitory effect of, respectively, 49.73% ± 9.54 ( p < 0.01) and 48.20% ± 8.49 ( p < 0.05) on thrombin and ADP -induced platelet aggregation. However the doses 0.1 mg/ml and 0.5 mg/ml of AcEO have no significant effect on the antiplatelet effect (Fig. 4).
